CustomFieldTranslation.name: ContactHardCreditNonSkew_Incremental__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: When checked, the Contact Hard Credit (Non-Skew) nightly job limits the number of Contacts selected for recalculation by looking for those Contacts recently updated Opportunities. This helps to improve Customisable Rollup nightly job performance.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Incremental Contact Hard Credit Non-Skew
